simulator

Class IODevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.IODevice

  • public class IODevice
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulation of an IO device. A device has an id and type name (e.g. 'printer'). Processes may make IO requests.

    It is expected that an IO request is blocking i.e. the calling process will be removed from the CPU while waiting for the request to complete.
